item.title: This Action Comedy With 87% On RT Is Now Streaming On Netflix, And It Stars Nicolas Cage Playing A Fictionalized Version Of Himself
item.description: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent is one of the best Nicolas Cage movies in recent memory, and this hilarious film is now available on Netflix.

item.title: Jurassic World: Rebirth Plot Theory
item.description: Screen Rant theorizes what the plot for Jurassic World: Rebirth could have been.

item.title: Eve Hewson's 10 Best Movies And TV Shows
item.description: The best Eve Hewson movies and TV shows showcase her rise from supporting roles in indie dramas to leading critically acclaimed feature films.
